channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Windows Desktop Bridge Virtual File System
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Windows Desktop Bridge Virtual File System

item.title: CVE-2018-0877|2024-08-05T03:44:11.034Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- windows%20desktop%20bridge%20virtual%20file%20system
item.description: The Desktop Bridge Virtual File System (VFS) in Windows 10 1607, 1703, and 1709, Windows Server 2016 and Windows Server, version 1709 allows an elevation of privilege vulnerability due to how file paths are managed, aka "Windows Desktop Bridge VFS Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability".
